product_name: Zoic Reign Quattro Bike Knickers - Men's
long_description: Bike shorts in disguise, the stretchy, feature-loaded Zoic Reign Quattro knickers for men let you ride in comfort, and then transition to the pub with absolute ease. Polyester/spandex fabric moves freely and features a Durable Water Repellent finish to bead up drizzle. Fusion gusset inseam provides superior range of motion and eliminates seat hang-ups. Cargo pockets with zip closures keep contents secure while riding. Front hand pockets, 2 reinforced back pockets; headphone cord control grommet and loop. Microfiber sunglass wipe is secured inside a pocket with an elastic strap. Zoic Reign Quattro bike knickers for men feature easy-glide locking zippers with logo tabs that stay shut while you ride. Tagless labels eliminate itching and irritation.
short_description: Bike shorts in disguise, the stretchy, feature-loaded Zoic Reign Quattro knickers for men let you ride in comfort, and then transition to the pub with absolute ease.
